# hasText

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the text-entry object has any text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var hasText: Bool { get }
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the backing store has textual content, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

## Inserting and deleting text

- **insertText(_:)**: Inserts a character into the displayed text.
- **deleteBackward()**: Deletes a character from the displayed text.
